string-array.name: petko
string-array.item: Petko Slaveykov Square (or just Slaveykov square) is a square in the center of Sofia. There you can see book market. In the 19th century the square was known as Cafe for great coffee Bashi, who was standing there. It was destroyed in 1878. On one corner of the square was a family house Slaveikovi.
Sofia, between George Rakovski and Graf Ignatiev streets. \nLocation: 42.692617, 23.323844 (Click to see on the map)
